2022 May 06 Added projects page

Experience

Software Programmer

Technion - Israel Institute of Technology: Computational MRI Lab

My main task as a software programmer in the TCML is to continue and lead the development of a user-friendly interface using Python (specifically PyQT5 and VTK) in order to assist the group towards of their research projects. In collaboration with the Department of Radiology at Rambam Health Care Campus, the goal of this project is to advance diagnostic and maintenance imaging for Crohn's Disease by developing deep learning techniques to enhance image quality and aid image analysis. In addition, I also assist the research group in an assortment of technical matters.
